name: Hephas Occupations & Traits With Vanilla Professions
author: Hephaistos

lang.UI_trait_AgileDesc: Nimble, quick & knows the basics of fluid movement.
lang.UI_trait_AgriculturistDesc:
Expert in crop cultivation.
Highly skilled in managing diverse crops, their specific requirements & growing optimization.
lang.UI_trait_Aim2Desc: Trained survivor in advanced aiming & shooting techniques.
lang.UI_trait_Aim3Desc:
Highly skilled & trained survivor.
Excels at precise shooting with ranged weapons.
lang.UI_trait_AllHailCaesarDesc:
Apes! Together! Strong!
[+30% foraging bonus to firewood and stones]
lang.UI_trait_Axe1Desc: Survivor learning basics of hatchet combat
lang.UI_trait_Axe2Desc: Seasoned warrior adept in axe combat & is able to cut through both wood & undead flesh with ease.
lang.UI_trait_Axe3Desc:
Highly skilled logger & axe handler.
Known for their unparalleled ability to cleave through hordes of undeads.
lang.UI_trait_BagsAndBeltsDesc:
Trader who is well-versed in efficient bags and belts usage.
Has higher maximum carrying capacity during their travels and trades.
Increased maximum carrying capacity.
[32 at max strength]
lang.UI_trait_BlacksmithMasterDesc: Can create exquisite weaponry with rare resources
lang.UI_trait_Blade1Desc: Survivor learning the art of sword combat.
lang.UI_trait_Blade2Desc: Seasoned warrior skilled in sword combat, adept at slicing through undead.
lang.UI_trait_Blade3Desc:
Masterful warrior trained in the ancient art of the blade.
Deadly force that elegantly slices through undead ranks with unparalleled skill & precision
lang.UI_trait_BleederDesc:
Wounds bleed excessively, heightening their severity and endangering survival.
[+100% damage from bleeding]
lang.UI_trait_Blunt1Desc: Survivor learning basics of long blunt combat
lang.UI_trait_Blunt2Desc: Skilled in long blunt combat, adept at breaking through obstacles & undead.
lang.UI_trait_Blunt3Desc: Powerful fighter wielding long blunt weapons, bulldozes through undead hordes effortlessly.
lang.UI_trait_BookLoverDesc: This survivor treasures two well-preserved books, one of the few really rare finds in the apocalypse.
lang.UI_trait_BrittleBodyDesc: Feels like every step is an effort, and every lift a strain.
lang.UI_trait_CoffeeLoverDesc:
Treasures a rare find: a pack of premium coffee.
A precious commodity in the apocalypse.
lang.UI_trait_ComicGeekDesc: True comic lover at heart, treasures two well-preserved exemplars.
lang.UI_trait_CommSpecialistDesc:
Highly skilled in operation, crafting & maintenance of communication devices.
Proficient at establishing contact and surveilling frequencies.
lang.UI_trait_Cook3Desc: Knows recipes from pre fall & how to decently fry a fresh rat
lang.UI_trait_Cooking1Desc:
Skilled at making meals that won't kill you.... instantly.
Consider it a culinary survival test.
lang.UI_trait_DislikesHeavyLoadDesc:
Carrying too much makes this survivor gradually stressed.
[+Stress if over 80% of the max carry capacity]
lang.UI_trait_DrunkenMasterDesc:
Survivor who uses intoxication to enhance combat.
However each undead defeated brings them closer to sobriety.
[+25% DMG while being drunk]
lang.UI_trait_Elect1Desc: Has basic knowledge of electrical systems.
lang.UI_trait_Elect2Desc:
Intermediate skill in electrical systems
Proficient in repairing complex circuits & electrical devices.
lang.UI_trait_EngineBuilderDesc:
Highly skilled mechanic.
Knows the maintenance & repair of all vehicle models.
lang.UI_trait_Farm2Desc:
Highly advanced understanding of crop cultivation
Knowledgeable in diverse crops & their specific needs for optimal growth.
lang.UI_trait_Farm3Desc:
Advanced understanding of crop cultivation
Knowledgeable in diverse crops & their specific needs for optimal growth.
lang.UI_trait_FieldMedicDesc:
Veteran in emergency care, very experienced in diagnosing & treating injuries & illnesses.
Adept at using whatever's on hand to provide effective medical aid in the field.
lang.UI_trait_Fishing2Desc:
Survivor with advanced fishing proficiency.
Adept at catching a variety of fish with specialized techniques & equipment.
lang.UI_trait_Forage1Desc: Keen observer of the natural world.
lang.UI_trait_Forage2Desc: Experienced in navigating diverse terrains and environments.
lang.UI_trait_Forage3Desc:
Master of finding ressources in the wild
Posses highly advanced knowledge of flora & fauna, able to sustain themselves within the wilderness.
lang.UI_trait_FrogFriendDesc: Welcomes a trusty frog friend into your company, providing companionship as you traverse the world.
lang.UI_trait_GuardsmenDesc:
Hardened survivor.
Skilled in perimeter defending against both undead & living threats.
lang.UI_trait_InsectHunterDesc:
An uncanny knack for spotting insects, this survivor can find bugs where others see none.
Increased chances of finding insects in the wilderness.
[+30% foraging bonus for insects & fishbait]
lang.UI_trait_KillerEcstasyDesc:
Every kill fills you with a rush of excitement, boosting happiness & lowering your boredom.
However, the intense thrill makes you sweat more than usual.
lang.UI_trait_LifterDesc:
Comfortable carrying more than most, this survivor sees every additional load as training.
Increased maximum carrying capacity.
[27kg at max strength]
lang.UI_trait_LightLoadLoverDesc:
This survivor finds happiness and stress relief when carrying a light load, preferring agility and freedom over heavy burdens.
[+Stress relief & happiness if under 30% of the max carry capacity]
lang.UI_trait_LightweightTravelerDesc:
Uncomfortable with carrying too much, this survivor shies away from excessive loads.
Reduced maximum carrying capacity.
[15kg at max strength]
lang.UI_trait_LumberjackDesc:
An expert in timber harvesting and preparing wood.
Skilled in felling trees, the undead and the living.
lang.UI_trait_Maint1Desc: Knowledge of basic usage of glue & duct tape.
lang.UI_trait_Maint2Desc: Knowledge of advanced equipment repairs & basic optimization.
lang.UI_trait_Mechanics4Desc:
Specialist in automotive machinery.
Highly skilled in building & maintaining vehicle systems if provided reference material.
lang.UI_trait_Medic2Desc:
Proficient in basic medical care
Skilled in treating injuries, illnesses, & first aid.
lang.UI_trait_Medic3Desc:
Expert in comprehensive medical care.
Highly skilled in diagnosing & treating injuries, illnesses & conditions effectively.
lang.UI_trait_Metal2Desc:
Advanced skill in metalworking.
Proficient in shaping, joining & repairing metal.
lang.UI_trait_Metal3Desc:
Expert in metalworking techniques.
Highly skilled in forging & fabricating intricate metal structures using advanced welding methods.
lang.UI_trait_MushroomGathererDesc:
Survivor with a keen eye for spotting fungi.
However, they lack knowledge of whether the mushrooms they find are edible or poisonous.
[+30% foraging bonus to mushrooms]
lang.UI_trait_PeacefulDesc:
Each zombie kill brings a wave of unease, making you unhappier & more stressed.
What if there are alive and just trapped inside their minds?
lang.UI_trait_Reload2Desc:
Experienced survivor in firearm reloading.
Proficient at quicker & smoother reloads under pressure.
lang.UI_trait_Reload3Desc:
Highly proficient in firearm reloading.
Executes lightning-fast reloads, minimizing downtime in combat.
lang.UI_trait_Sew2Desc:
Expert in tailoring techniques
Highly skilled in designing and crafting clothing & utilizing advanced sewing skills.
lang.UI_trait_ShelterBuilderDesc:
Mastery in carpentry and construction.
Renowned for crafting sturdy & functional shelters, structures & fortifications.
lang.UI_trait_ShortBlade1Desc: Survivor learning basics of knife combat.
lang.UI_trait_ShortBlade2Desc: Seasoned warrior skilled in knife combat, adept at silently killing undeads.
lang.UI_trait_ShortBlade3Desc:
Masterful fighter wielding knifes.
Strikes with deadly precision, swiftly taking down undead & living foes.
lang.UI_trait_ShortBlunt1Desc: Survivor learning basics of blunt combat.
lang.UI_trait_ShortBlunt2Desc: Seasoned warrior skilled in blunt combat, adept at taking down obstacles & undead.
lang.UI_trait_ShortBlunt3Desc: Brute force in the field, this fighter wields blunt weapons with unmatched power, smashing through undead hordes with ease.
lang.UI_trait_ShunnedDesc: An outcast among survivors, ostracized for reasons unknown or misunderstood by others.
lang.UI_trait_Spear1Desc: Survivor learning the art of spear combat.
lang.UI_trait_Spear2Desc:
Seasoned warrior skilled in spear combat.
Adept at thrusting through & piercing undead.
lang.UI_trait_Spear3Desc:
Masterful fighter wielding spears.
Perfectly maintains distance, while skewering undead with precision & agility.
lang.UI_trait_ThreadSmithDesc:
Master of the needle and thread & is known for their unparalleled skill in tailoring.
Very experienced at crafting intricate garments and textile creations.
lang.UI_trait_TrackerDesc:
Survivor with special tracking skills, able to read the signs of the wilderness.
Whether it's following the trail of prey or tracking the movements of other survivors, their expertise is highly advanced.
lang.UI_trait_TraderDesc: Resourceful merchant navigating through dangerous places, seeking profit amidst the chaos.
lang.UI_trait_TrainedGunmanDesc:
Masterful skilled fighter in firearm handling & tactics.
Proficient with various firearms for effective combat against undead & living threats.
lang.UI_trait_Trap1Desc: Has basic understanding of traps to catch small game.
lang.UI_trait_Trap2Desc: Proficient in setting snares & simple traps.
lang.UI_trait_Trap3Desc:
Expert in trapping craft & setup.
Capable of designing & deploying sophisticated traps to catch elusive prey.
lang.UI_trait_VernDesc:
Embrace the Vern way!
Vern hates guns and everything that comes with it.
lang.UI_trait_WandererDesc: Lone traveler, weaving their own tale in a harsh world teeming with threats.
lang.UI_trait_WineLoverDesc:
Treasures a rare find: a fine bottle of wine & a delicate wine glass.
A really rare commodity in the apocalypse.
lang.UI_trait_Wood2Desc:
Advanced carpentry knowledge.
Proficient in building sturdy structures & furniture.
lang.UI_trait_Wood3Desc:
Expert in carpentry
Adept at repurposing salvaged materials to create durable constructions.
lang.UI_trait_breathingTechniqueDesc:
Survivor who has mastered a special breathing technique, allowing them to recover from exhaustion faster while sitting on the ground.
[+25% endurance recovery bonus while sitting]
lang.UI_trait_tinkerer2Desc: The go-to tech guru: adept at repairing gadgets & knows how to craft special explosives.
